extends java.lang.Object
    Controller, center of application logic

      Drawing additional grid

      Pause game
      private void pieceDropped()
      Method which is called when the piece is dropped down This piece will remain as a part of the board until it's line will not be removed, until then it's stored in board array

      Tries to remove full lines, and when it succeeds, it increments the score

      Rotates piece 90 degrees to the right
